apple_vendor_description: This depiction of a kiss between a dark-skinned man and a light-skinned person on Apple devices captures a moment of tender affection with Apple's characteristic warmth and nuanced design. The skin tones are rendered with realistic lighting and smooth gradients, emphasizing the gentle connection between the two individuals, while the soft rounded edges of their features contribute to an overall feeling of intimacy. On Apple devices, this emoji powerfully conveys love, romance, and the beauty of diverse relationships.
